name: Operations Status Finder
description: Helps operations managers quickly find status updates, project information, team updates, and cross-departmental information across organizational documentation.

friction_addressed.description: Finding status updates, project information, and team updates across multiple departments
Reducing time spent switching between different department contexts and information sources
Finding information needed for cross-departmental communication and stakeholder updates

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster access to cross-departmental status and project information

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to project documents, status reports, team updates, and departmental files
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) project status reports, (2) team updates and meeting notes, (3) departmental reports, (4) operational dashboards and KPI documents

optional.name: Email
optional.reason: Can search email for status updates, project communications, and team announcements
optional.setup_instructions: Enable if operations manager receives status updates and project information via email

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to project management or ERP systems via Graph connectors
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for project management or operational systems

actions.description: This agent retrieves information but does not update project status, modify documents, or send communications.

conversation_starters.title: Project status
conversation_starters.text: What's the current status of [project name]?

conversation_starters.title: Team updates
conversation_starters.text: What are the latest updates from the [department] team?

conversation_starters.title: Weekly highlights
conversation_starters.text: Summarize the key operational updates from this week

conversation_starters.title: Issue tracking
conversation_starters.text: Are there any open issues or blockers across projects?

conversation_starters.title: Meeting prep
conversation_starters.text: What do I need to know before my meeting with [team/person]?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with project status documents
Team updates and meeting notes accessible via SharePoint

data_not_accessed: Live project management system data (unless Graph connector configured)
admin_considerations: Ensure status reports are regularly updated in SharePoint
Consider which departmental information should be accessible
Encourage teams to maintain consistent status update formats
